'''Almarian''' ([[Quenya|Q]], pron. {{IPA|[alˈmari.an]}}) was the daughter of [[Vëantur]],<ref>{{UT|Wife}}</ref> Queen to [[Tar-Meneldur]], the fifth King of [[Númenor]], and mother to [[Tar-Aldarion]], the sixth King, and to [[Ailinel]] and [[Almiel]].  She was said to possess great beauty.<ref>{{UT|earlier}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Almarian'' is a [[Quenya]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but Paul Strack suggests it contains ''[[almare]]'' ("blessedness").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-1562159121.html|articlename=Q. ''Almarian'' f.|website=Eldamo|accessed=26 January 2022}}</ref>
